abilities.name: Meowlotov Cocktail
abilities.description: Throw a bomb on the ground that keeps explodes 3 times

abilities.name: Dragonic Theft
abilities.description: Steal a bonus action from a monster/humaniod stopping it from using a bonus action next turn

abilities.name: Warforged
abilities.description: When fighting multiple enemies gain an extra action

abilities.name: Furr-ious
abilities.description: Small animals will not attack you

abilities.name: Power Drum
abilities.description: your palico starts beating on the drum giving you and your allies a 15% dmg boost

abilities.name: Healing Bomb
abilities.description: The palico throws a bomb that heals you and the surrounding allies(1 square each side and diagonally)

abilities.name: War Drums
abilities.description: Need to have power drums equipped. Buffs power drum to 40%

abilities.name: Advantage drums
abilities.description: your next attack has and advantage roll

abilities.name: Blood Awakening
abilities.description: your 3rd consecutive hit does double dmg

abilities.name: Defiance
abilities.description: When monster enrages increase defense by 20%

abilities.name: Element exploit
abilities.description: Increase elemental damage done by another D6
